results.title: Intellectual development in c28hildren
results.brief_description: The film deals with the intellectual development of infants; Piaget’s six stages of sensory-motor activities. According to Piaget, all babies follow the same developmental sequence of activities although not necessarily at the same time. Illustrates the six stages with appropriate commentary using babies from the age of three weeks, to children who can comprehend and are beginning to use speech.

results.title: Integration: a place for everyone
results.brief_description: Presents an overview of the integration process at work. Indicates parents’ desires for their disabled children at school. Stresses necessity of support group between school and family and classroom modifications for successful integration. Highlights educational and social benefits for the dissabled child.

results.title: Integrating disabled children into regular schools (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Joe Dora and Chisholm Institute of Technology. School of Education
results.brief_description: Integrating disabled children into mainstream schools throughout Australia requires careful thought and action on the part of the disabled, their parents, teachers and all concerned. This video presents the thoughts of these people in discrete segments suitable for discussion.

results.title: Integrated curriculum
results.creator_credit: Lily Steiner, Chris O'Rourke, Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch and Jeff Spencer
results.brief_description: Shows how an integrated curriculum can operate in classrooms with children ranging from preparatory to years five and six. It shows how different areas of the curriculum can be integrated to promote learning.

results.title: Integrated Alternative Health Care
results.brief_description: We are shown the full range of medical and educational programs with their new approach to integrated care, which has also been called alternative medicine. The film focuses on the role of paramedics and on their education and their motivation.

results.title: Insult to Injury
results.brief_description: A Greek factory employee injured his back at work. This program examines the problems that he encountered with doctors, Workers’ Compensation, and Unions, and their attitudes towards him.
